The claim made by U: S. Rep. Steve Stockman that John Cornyn "voted twice in 2013 to back Obama’s amnesty plan."
The fact: checking process that involved examining Cornyn's votes and exploring Obama's connection to the plan.
The rating given by PolitiFact in Washin: D.C., which rated the claim as Half True.
Cornyn: s campaign spokesman providing instances of Cornyn voting against the measure and his "no" vote in committee, as well as his vote against final approval along with Sen. Ted Cruz.
